ygData.subject: Re: Bard only equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t have any specifics, but yes, there is bard only equipment.  There is at least one bard only weapon (I ve been told it has a 1:1 damage to delay ratio
ygData.messageBody:
I don't have any specifics, but yes, there is bard only equipment. There is
at least one bard only weapon (I've been told it has a 1:1 damage to delay
ratio too). Additionally, there are many pieces of equipment that are
usable only by bards and rogues, elf-hide gloves are one, I believe.

Jyzan

Tom Lee wrote:

> From: Tom Lee <tom_lee@...>
>
> Hello fellow bards !
>
> I have been perusing this site for a while amongst others and have
> noticed no references to specialty items available only to bards, other
> than their instruments of course.
>
> Does anyone know if bards get their own special equipment? If so, I
> would be interested in hearing about it.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Lorenthal
>
